panels.title: 【${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD}~${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD}最大资源使用的日期：${maxday}】【$env】高峰时段全局资源统计与各资源TOP10

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    concat(namespace,':',deployment) AS name,
    sum(p95_pod_load * pod_count) AS load
  FROM
    kubedoor.${table} PREWHERE date = '${maxday}'AND ${env}
  GROUP BY
    name
    order by load desc
    limit 10

SELECT
    concat(namespace,':',deployment) AS name,
    sum(p95_pod_cpu_pct) AS load
  FROM
    kubedoor.${table} PREWHERE date = '${maxday}'AND ${env}
  GROUP BY
    name
    order by load desc
    limit 10

SELECT
    concat(namespace,':',deployment) AS name,
    sum(p95_pod_wss_mb * pod_count) AS load
  FROM
    kubedoor.${table} PREWHERE date = '${maxday}'AND ${env}
  GROUP BY
    name
    order by load desc
    limit 10

SELECT
    concat(namespace,':',deployment) AS name,
    sum(p95_pod_wss_pct) AS load
  FROM
    kubedoor.${table} PREWHERE date = '${maxday}'AND ${env}
  GROUP BY
    name
    order by load desc
    limit 10

SELECT
    concat(namespace,':',deployment) AS name,
    sum(pod_count) AS load
  FROM
    kubedoor.${table} PREWHERE date = '${maxday}'AND ${env}
  GROUP BY
    name
    order by load desc
    limit 10

panels.title: 命名空间级别最大资源使用分析

targets.rawSql:
-- 计算每个命名空间的值
WITH per_namespace AS (
  SELECT
    namespace,
    count(DISTINCT(deployment)) AS deployment,
    sum(pod_count) AS pod,
    sum(p95_pod_load * pod_count) AS load,
    sum(p95_pod_wss_mb * pod_count) AS mem,
    sum(request_pod_cpu_m * pod_count/1000) AS cpu_request,
    sum(limit_pod_cpu_m * pod_count/1000) AS cpu_limit,
    sum(request_pod_mem_mb * pod_count) AS mem_request,
    sum(limit_pod_mem_mb * pod_count) AS mem_limit
  FROM
    kubedoor.${table} PREWHERE date = '${maxday}'AND ${env}
  GROUP BY
    namespace
),
-- 计算总数
totals AS (
  SELECT
    sum(deployment) AS total_deployment,
    sum(pod) AS total_pod,
    sum(load) AS total_load,
    sum(mem) AS total_mem,
    sum(cpu_request) AS total_cpu_request,
    sum(cpu_limit) AS total_cpu_limit,
    sum(mem_request) AS total_mem_request,
    sum(mem_limit) AS total_mem_limit
  FROM
    per_namespace
) -- 合并并计算占比
SELECT
  per_namespace.namespace,
  per_namespace.deployment,
  per_namespace.deployment / totals.total_deployment AS deployment_percentage,
  per_namespace.pod,
  per_namespace.pod / totals.total_pod AS pod_percentage,

  per_namespace.cpu_request,
  per_namespace.cpu_request / totals.total_cpu_request AS cpu_request_percentage,
  per_namespace.load,
  per_namespace.load / totals.total_load AS load_percentage,
  per_namespace.cpu_limit,
  per_namespace.cpu_limit / totals.total_cpu_limit AS cpu_limit_percentage,

  per_namespace.mem_request,
  per_namespace.mem_request / totals.total_mem_request AS mem_request_percentage,
  per_namespace.mem,
  per_namespace.mem / totals.total_mem AS mem_percentage,
  per_namespace.mem_limit,
  per_namespace.mem_limit / totals.total_mem_limit AS mem_limit_percentage

FROM
  per_namespace
  CROSS JOIN totals

panels.title: 【${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD}~${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD}最大资源使用的日期：${maxday}】【各命名空间级别】高峰时段P95资源使用量与资源占整体资源比例

targets.rawSql:
-- 计算每个命名空间的值
WITH per_namespace AS (
  SELECT
    namespace,
    deployment,
    sum(pod_count) AS pod,
    sum(p95_pod_load * pod_count) AS load,
    sum(p95_pod_wss_mb * pod_count) AS mem,
    sum(request_pod_cpu_m * pod_count/1000) AS cpu_request,
    sum(limit_pod_cpu_m * pod_count/1000) AS cpu_limit,
    sum(request_pod_mem_mb * pod_count) AS mem_request,
    sum(limit_pod_mem_mb * pod_count) AS mem_limit
  FROM
    kubedoor.${table} PREWHERE date = '${maxday}' AND ${env} AND ${namespace}
  GROUP BY
    namespace,deployment
),
-- 计算总数
totals AS (
  SELECT
    sum(pod) AS total_pod,
    sum(load) AS total_load,
    sum(mem) AS total_mem,
    sum(cpu_request) AS total_cpu_request,
    sum(cpu_limit) AS total_cpu_limit,
    sum(mem_request) AS total_mem_request,
    sum(mem_limit) AS total_mem_limit
  FROM
    per_namespace
) -- 合并并计算占比
SELECT
  per_namespace.namespace,
  per_namespace.deployment,
  per_namespace.pod,
  per_namespace.pod / totals.total_pod AS pod_percentage,
  per_namespace.cpu_request,
  per_namespace.cpu_request / totals.total_cpu_request AS cpu_request_percentage,
  per_namespace.load,
  per_namespace.load / totals.total_load AS load_percentage,
  per_namespace.cpu_limit,
  per_namespace.cpu_limit / totals.total_cpu_limit AS cpu_limit_percentage,

  per_namespace.mem_request,
  per_namespace.mem_request / totals.total_mem_request AS mem_request_percentage,
  per_namespace.mem,
  per_namespace.mem / totals.total_mem AS mem_percentage,
  per_namespace.mem_limit,
  per_namespace.mem_limit / totals.total_mem_limit AS mem_limit_percentage

FROM
  per_namespace
  CROSS JOIN totals

panels.title: 【${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD}~${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD}最大资源使用的日期：${maxday}】【各微服务级别】高峰时段P95资源使用量与资源占整体资源比例
每日高峰时段P95内存使用率

targets.rawSql:
-- 计算每个命名空间的值
WITH per_namespace AS (
  SELECT
    namespace,
    deployment,
    sum(pod_count) AS pod,
    sum(p95_pod_load) AS load,
    sum(p95_pod_wss_mb) AS mem,
    sum(p95_pod_cpu_pct) AS cpu_pct,
    sum(p95_pod_wss_pct) AS mem_pct,
    sum(request_pod_cpu_m/1000) AS cpu_request,
    sum(limit_pod_cpu_m/1000) AS cpu_limit,
    sum(request_pod_mem_mb) AS mem_request,
    sum(limit_pod_mem_mb) AS mem_limit
  FROM
    kubedoor.${table} PREWHERE date = '${maxday}' AND ${env} AND ${namespace}
  GROUP BY
    namespace,deployment
),
-- 计算总数
totals AS (
  SELECT
    sum(pod) AS total_pod
  FROM
    per_namespace
) -- 合并并计算占比
SELECT
  per_namespace.namespace,
  per_namespace.deployment,
  per_namespace.pod,
  per_namespace.pod / totals.total_pod * 100 AS pod_percentage,

  per_namespace.cpu_request,
  per_namespace.load,
  per_namespace.cpu_pct,
  per_namespace.cpu_limit,

  per_namespace.mem_request,
  per_namespace.mem,
  per_namespace.mem_pct,
  per_namespace.mem_limit

FROM
  per_namespace
  CROSS JOIN totals

panels.title: 【${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD}~${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD}最大资源使用的日期：${maxday}】【各Pod级别】高峰时段P95资源使用量与使用率分析
各微服务每日高峰时段P95 CPU负载
各微服务每日高峰时段P95 内存使用量
各Pod每日高峰时段P95 CPU负载
各Pod每日高峰时段P95内存使用量

list.definition:
SELECT
concat(env ,'#env = \'',env,'\'') 
from  kubedoor.${table} PREWHERE $__timeFilter(date) 
group by env
list.label: 环境
list.name: env
list.query:
SELECT
concat(env ,'#env = \'',env,'\'') 
from  kubedoor.${table} PREWHERE $__timeFilter(date) 
group by env

list.definition:
SELECT
concat(namespace,'#namespace = \'',namespace,'\'') 
from  kubedoor.${table} PREWHERE $__timeFilter(date) and ${env}
group by namespace
list.label: 命名空间
list.name: namespace
list.query:
SELECT
concat(namespace,'#namespace = \'',namespace,'\'') 
from  kubedoor.${table} PREWHERE $__timeFilter(date) and ${env}
group by namespace

list.definition:
SELECT
concat(deployment,'#deployment = \'',deployment,'\'') 
from  kubedoor.${table} PREWHERE $__timeFilter(date) and ${env} and ${namespace}
group by deployment
list.label: 微服务
list.name: deployment
list.query:
SELECT
concat(deployment,'#deployment = \'',deployment,'\'') 
from  kubedoor.${table} PREWHERE $__timeFilter(date) and ${env} and ${namespace}
group by deployment

list.definition:
SELECT

concat(formatDateTime(toDateTime(date), '%Y-%m-%d'),'#',formatDateTime(toDateTime(date), '%Y-%m-%d %T'))
 AS formatted_date
FROM
    kubedoor.${table}
PREWHERE
    $__timeFilter(date) AND ${env}
GROUP BY
    formatted_date
ORDER BY
    SUM(pod_count * p95_pod_load) DESC
LIMIT
    1
list.label: 最大资源使用的日期
list.name: maxday
list.query:
SELECT

concat(formatDateTime(toDateTime(date), '%Y-%m-%d'),'#',formatDateTime(toDateTime(date), '%Y-%m-%d %T'))
 AS formatted_date
FROM
    kubedoor.${table}
PREWHERE
    $__timeFilter(date) AND ${env}
GROUP BY
    formatted_date
ORDER BY
    SUM(pod_count * p95_pod_load) DESC
LIMIT
    1

title: K8S每日高峰时段资源数据分析
